original_title: Thugaboo: A Miracle on D-roc's Street
overview: D-Roc, Dee-Dee, DJ, Money, Lissette, Slim, Chad, Gwenny, and Soo Young are working together to find a way to bring the true meaning of Christmas home to less fortunate young Gavin and his family.
tagline: It's Christmas time in Boo York and D-Roc, Dee-Dee, Chad, Slim and the entire Boo Crew discover the true meaning of Christmas.
title: Thugaboo: A Miracle on D-roc's Street
